header.name: Chetan Sharma
header.bio: Web developer with {{experience}} of experience specializing in React, javascript, HTML, CSS. Adept at delivering efficient, high-quality solutions with a focus on modularity and scalability. Recognized consistently for performance excellence and innovation in web development

projects.name: Qualaroo
responsibilities: Survey Status Management Feature: Developed a feature that allows users to change the status of their surveys, improving survey management and usability within the platform. This feature enhanced user control and streamlined workflows for survey creators.
Advanced Survey Reporting: Engineered a robust reporting system that processes and visualizes survey responses, enabling users to extract key insights through data-driven dashboards and analytics.
Performance Optimization: Implemented lazy loading and code splitting techniques, reducing page load times and improving app performance.

description: Developed scalable, modular code following best practices, leading to a 60% reduction in build time by optimizing the migration to MFE architecture
Improved CI/CD processes by integrating automated testing, monitoring, and deployment tools like Jenkins, SonarQube, and Datadog
Mentored junior developers and contributed to internal hackathons, earning recognition for innovation and technical excellence

projects.name: HRMS
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a comprehensive HR Management System (HRMS) using React, streamlining HR processes for over 1000+ employees.

Improved User Experience: Boosted employee satisfaction by 50% by developing interactive React components for project assignment, dynamic settings, vendor, inventory, and leave management, ensuring a user-friendly and adaptable work environment.
Scalable Architecture: Employed Reactâ€™s component- based architecture to facilitate future growth and integration of new functionalities as the company scales.

projects.name: CA Cloud Desk
responsibilities: Developed a scalable, real-time collaboration platform for CA Cloud Desk using React , supporting over 10,000 Chartered Accountants, Company Secretaries, and tax professionals
Enhanced Communication: Reduced response times by 25% through integrating Socket.IO for real-time communication, enabling instant document updates, team collaboration, and faster client service.
Robust Data Management: Leveraged React's state management to ensure data consistency and real-time updates across all user interfaces, reducing errors and improving data integrity

projects.name: Cotion - A Fullstack Notion Clone
projects.desc: Cotion is a sophisticated Fullstack Notion alternative, utilizing Next.js, ShadCN UI, and Tailwind CSS for the frontend, and powered by Convex for the backend and database. This meticulously crafted application replicates almost all of Notion's features

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
